pg 1 m aterials do uble knit yarn of your choice 4m m crochet hook for dk acrylic 3 5mm crochet hook for eco-fusion needle for sewing in ends ya rn colours and quantities i have used 5 colours for my blanket working 1 square in colour and 1 square in monochrome please feel free to use as many or few colours as you would like eco-fusion quantities for 120x120cm lapghan yo ur square should measure 9cm once complete vanilla fawn orchid sweatpea lime bu y using this link ht tps //hookedonsunshine co/proddetail php prod=poh1 50 grams approx 125 meters va nilla approx 550g/1375m faw n approx 350g/875m or chid approx 100g/250m sw eetpea approx 100g/250m lime approx 100g/250m if you purchase a yarn pack you will need to match my gauge and gauge or you might run short of yarn all of my quantities are rounded up to the nearest 50grams acrylic quantities for 120x120cm lapghan your square should measure 10 5cm once complete yo u will use roughly 2790 metres yarn quantities and overall blanket size may vary due to yarn choice gauge and hook size a pearl of hope - pg 2 this pattern uses us terminology you will note that my starting chain for a double_crochet and half_double_crochet is 2 i e ch2 this is just a personal preference you are welcome to start with ch3 for a double_crochet and ch2 for a half_double_crochet or even start with standing stitch do what is comfortable for you curly brackets indicate a complete corner abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet bpdc back post double yo insert your hook from the back to the crochet front around the post of the stitch complete a double_crochet as normal bphdc back post half double yo insert your hook from the back to the crochet front around the post of the stitch complete a half_double_crochet as normal decrease double_crochet 2 yo insert hook into indicated st pull up a together loop yo pull through 2 loops 2 loops on the hook yo insert hook into same st pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on the hook yo pull through all 3 loops decrease over 2 sps double_crochet 2 yo insert hook into 1st indicated space pull together over 2 spaces up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 2
